availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John D Wickliffe (Captain in 2nd Regiment kentucky cav)

body.p: Born in 1838. Captain for 2nd Regiment Kentucky Cavalry, Company A. Died on September 13, 1922, in Nelson, Kentucky.

bibl.p: J. H. Battle, W. H. Perrin, & G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State (Louisville: Battey Publishing, 1885), 720; "Kentucky, Vital Record Indexes, 1911-1999," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QKH1-WDTK : 1 July 2015), John D Wickliffe, 13 Sep 1922; citing Death, Nelson, Kentucky, United States, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort.
